descriptions.description: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP. It is a non-interactive commandline tool, so it may easily be called from scripts, cron jobs, or terminals. GNU Wget has many features to make retrieving large files or mirroring entire web or FTP sites easy.

GNU Wget ist ein freies Software-Paket zum Abrufen von Dateien über HTTP, HTTPS und FTP. Es ist ein nicht-interaktives Kommandozeilen-Tool, so dass es leicht von Skripten, Cron-Jobs oder Terminals aus aufgerufen werden kann. GNU Wget hat viele Funktionen, die das Abrufen von großen Dateien oder Spiegeln von gesamten Web oder FTP-Sites einfach machen.

set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=wget PACKAGE_VERSION=1.15
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.xz
oeg_include_files AUTHORS COPYING README
oegimport libiconv oegimport gettext oegimport libidn # optional oegimport gnutls # optional
#for gnutls: oegimport gmp # required oegimport readline oegimport zlib # optional, for compression oegimport nettle # required, has to contain libhogweed (means: compiled with gmp support) #oegimport gmp #oegimport readline oegimport openssl #oegimport zlib oegimport libtasn1 # optional, for ASN.1 parsing, a copy is included in GnuTLS oegimport p11-kit # optional, for smart card support oegimport libiconv oegimport gettext oegimport libtasn1 oegimport libffi #oegimport trousers # optional, for TPM support oegimport unbound # optional, for DNSSEC/DANE functionality oegimport expat oegimport openssl # or let it out oegimport zlib oegimport pthreads-win32 # or use: --without-pthreads oegimport ldns # required
# noch testen, ob zlib vergessen (-lz) # pfad prüfen!
oegpatch 001 # wget 1.14: needed, if during linking: undefined reference to `IN6_ARE_ADDR_EQUAL'
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-gnu-ld --with-libiconv-prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-libintl-prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --with-ssl=gnutls --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
